Hi there! Of course, I'd be happy to help you with that. We currently have a carton of Gala apples available. They are slightly overripe, but still good to eat or use for baking. Can I interest you in purchasing them?

Certainly! The carton of overripe Gala apples has 25 apples in it. They are still good to eat despite being overripe, and can also be used for baking or cooking. If you're interested, I can arrange for the carton to be shipped to you right away.
